mapper.update: UPDATE DATAGEAR_AUTHORIZATION SET AUTH_RESOURCE = #{entity.resource}, AUTH_RESOURCE_TYPE = #{entity.resourceType}, AUTH_PRINCIPAL = #{entity.principal}, AUTH_PRINCIPAL_TYPE = #{entity.principalType}, AUTH_PERMISSION = #{entity.permission}, AUTH_ENABLED = #{entity.enabled, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE AUTH_ID = #{entity.id}
mapper.select: SELECT T.* FROM () T WHERE T.${_iq_}id${_iq_} = #{id}

choose.otherwise:

) T1 ON T0.${_iq_}id${_iq_} = T1.DATA_ID WHERE T1.DATA_PERMISSION >= ${DP_MIN_READ_PERMISSION}

mapper.sql: SELECT A.AUTH_ID AS DP_AUTH_DATA_ID, A.AUTH_CREATE_USER_ID AS DP_AUTH_DATA_CREATOR_ID FROM DATAGEAR_AUTHORIZATION A

SELECT A.AUTH_ID AS ${_iq_}id${_iq_}, A.AUTH_RESOURCE AS ${_iq_}resource${_iq_}, A.AUTH_RESOURCE_TYPE AS ${_iq_}resourceType${_iq_}, A.AUTH_PRINCIPAL AS ${_iq_}principal${_iq_}, A.AUTH_PRINCIPAL_TYPE AS ${_iq_}principalType${_iq_}, A.AUTH_PERMISSION AS ${_iq_}permission${_iq_}, A.AUTH_ENABLED AS ${_iq_}enabled${_iq_}, A.AUTH_CREATE_TIME AS ${_iq_}ceateTime${_iq_}, A.AUTH_CREATE_USER_ID AS ${_iq_}createUser.id${_iq_}, A.USER_NAME AS ${_iq_}createUser.name${_iq_}, A.USER_REAL_NAME AS ${_iq_}createUser.realName${_iq_}, A.USER_IS_ADMIN AS ${_iq_}createUser.admin${_iq_}, A.USER_CREATE_TIME AS ${_iq_}createUser.createTime${_iq_},
( CASE A.AUTH_RESOURCE_TYPE WHEN '${resourceType}' THEN B.RESOURCE_NAME WHEN '${resourceType}_PATTERN' THEN A.AUTH_RESOURCE ELSE A.AUTH_RESOURCE END )
A.AUTH_RESOURCE
AS ${_iq_}resourceName${_iq_}, ( CASE A.AUTH_PRINCIPAL_TYPE WHEN 'ALL' THEN '${queryContext.principalAllLabel}' WHEN 'ANONYMOUS' THEN '${queryContext.principalAnonymousLabel}' WHEN 'ROLE' THEN C.ROLE_NAME WHEN 'USER' THEN ( CASE WHEN D.USER_REAL_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN D.USER_REAL_NAME ELSE D.USER_NAME END ) ELSE A.AUTH_PRINCIPAL END ) AS ${_iq_}principalName${_iq_},
( CASE A.AUTH_PERMISSION
WHEN ${item.value} THEN '${item.label}'
ELSE '' END )
A.AUTH_PERMISSION
AS ${_iq_}permissionLabel${_iq_} FROM () A
LEFT JOIN (${resourceNameQueryView}) B ON A.AUTH_RESOURCE_TYPE = '${resourceType}' AND A.AUTH_RESOURCE = B.RESOURCE_ID
LEFT JOIN DATAGEAR_ROLE C ON A.AUTH_PRINCIPAL_TYPE = 'ROLE' AND A.AUTH_PRINCIPAL = C.ROLE_ID LEFT JOIN DATAGEAR_USER D ON A.AUTH_PRINCIPAL_TYPE = 'USER' AND A.AUTH_PRINCIPAL = D.USER_ID
WHERE A.AUTH_RESOURCE_TYPE = '${resourceType}' OR AUTH_RESOURCE_TYPE = '${resourceType}_PATTERN'
SELECT A.*, B.USER_NAME, B.USER_REAL_NAME, B.USER_IS_ADMIN, B.USER_CREATE_TIME FROM DATAGEAR_AUTHORIZATION A INNER JOIN DATAGEAR_USER B ON A.AUTH_CREATE_USER_ID = B.USER_ID
